title: Chef Bounties
content:
Chef bounties award money and experience in the Chef profession when handed in. They are available after reaching level 9 in the Chef profession and can be grabbed from the Chef Bounty Board in The Delectable Dab Kitchen. There will be 4 options to claim that refresh every hour, 5 minutes past the hour. There is a maximum of 6 active bounties accepted at one time.

Current active bounties can be accessed by hitting the "B" key or opening the Bounties interface. Accepted bounties never expire, but can be abandoned by selecting it in the bounties interface and choosing the Abandon option.

Attempting to hand the wrong item will cause the recipient to say something along the lines of it not being what they ordered. You won't lose the items in this case.

Notes.text: Furthest point for a delivery. Watch out for aggressive ghouls along the path there
